Deembedding
===========

.. code-block:: python
   
    +-------------------------------------------------+
    |                 Sexternal                       |
    |                                                 |
    |    +-------------+                              |
    |    |  Sinternal  |                              |
    |    |            ( )----------------------------( )
    |    |             |               :              |
    |    |             |               :              |
    |    |             |               :              |
    |    |            ( )----------------------------( )
    |    |             |                              |
    |    |             |         +---------+          |
    |    |             |         | Deembed |          |
    |    |             |         |         |          |
    |    |            ( )-------( )       ( )--------( )
    |    |             |    :    |         |     :    |
    |    |       ip    |    :    | dpi dpe |     :    | ep
    |    |             |    :    |         |     :    |
    |    |            ( )-------( )       ( )--------( )
    |    |             |         |         |          |
    |    +-------------+         +---------+          |
    |                                                 |
    +-------------------------------------------------+

    known: Sexternal (SE), Deembed (SD)
    find : Sinternal (SI)

    IntPorts = {dpi:ip, ...}
    ExtPorts = {dpe:ep, ...}

    The result is the rfCircuit object solving for

    +-------------+ 
    |  Sinternal  | 
    |            ( )
    |             | 
    |             | 
    |             | 
    |            ( )
    |             | 
    |             | 
    |             | 
    |             | 
    |            ( )
    |             | 
    |       ip    | 
    |             | 
    |            ( )
    |             | 
    +-------------+
